info.role: 3rd year student - Mathematics and Computer Science

edu.title: Third year at the multidisciplinary faculty of Nador in mathematics and computer science (SMI)
edu.desc: Develop specialized knowledge of computer modules, such as advanced databases, system programming (Linux), advanced web, networks.

edu.title: Second year at the multidisciplinary faculty of Nador in mathematics and computer science (SMI)
edu.desc: Multidisciplinary Faculty of Nador. Obtained the diploma of general university studies (DEUG) in mathematics and computer science with a mention enough good. Subjects taught: Computer science, web basics, operating systems, numerical analysis, probabilities and statistics - Self-training. In parallel, self-training on the basics of artificial intelligence and machine learning (classification models, regression models using the artificial neural network approach) and programming in Python language.

edu.title: First year at the multidisciplinary faculty of Nador in mathematics and applied sciences (SMA)
edu.desc: Basic mathematics, physics and computer modules. "I had to repeat the first year several times because of my lack of French (subjects are taught in French from Bac+1 in Morocco)"

edu.title: Scientific baccalaureate in physics and chemistry

projet.title: Generation and Classification of the Tifinagh handwritten letters corpus (Berber language alphabet) using deep learning models ANN, CNN and GANs
projet.authers: Issam Seddik, Prof. Saf√¢a El Ouahabi
projet.desc: This project concerns the development of methods for the recognition of Tifinagh handwritten letters using the deep learning approach (ANN, CNN) and their generation using generative adversarial networks (GANs).

projet.title: Blockchain system (transaction management) in Java
projet.authers: Issam Seddik, Prof. Khalid EL Makkaoui, Prof. Anas El Ansari, Prof. Mohamed Fartitchou, Jamal Boussouf, Wiam Choukoud, Mohamed Chillou, Hassan Talhaoui, Hanae Aurag, Redouan Bayyay
projet.desc: Design and UML modeling of a Blockchain system for transaction management - Implementation of a decentralized monetary transaction system based on Blockchain technology - Source code: : https://github.com/seddikissam/Blockchain-under-a-clear-vision

projet.title: High Level - Distance learning courses
projet.desc: In the context of the COVID-19 pandemic, we have created a platform to provide distance learning tutoring to middle and high school students. Instagram account: https://www.instagram.com/highlevel.psh/

projet.title: Tifinagh-MNIST: creation of a new database for the handwritten letters of the Berber language (Tifinagh)
projet.authers: Issam Seddik, Moussa Seddik, Mohamed El Amine Seddik.
projet.desc: In this work, we have created a new dataset for the Berber language letters (Tifinagh), this dataset is intended for the development of AI tools to process handwritten Tifinagh characters and it adopts the same format as the traditional MNIST images.

comp.title: Maths
